00033 void calcObservables(const Interaction* Int,
00034                      const SlaterDet* Q,
00035                      Observables* obs)
00036 {
00037   SlaterDetAux X;
00038   initSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00039   calcSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00040 
00041   calcT(Q, &X, &obs->t);
00042   calcTCM(Q, &X, &obs->tcm);
00043   calcPotential(Int, Q, &X, obs->v);
00044 
00045   if (Int->cm) obs->t -= obs->tcm;
00046   obs->h = obs->t + obs->v[0];
00047 
00048   calcRadii2(Q, &X, &obs->r2m, &obs->r2p, &obs->r2n);
00049   calcAngularMomenta(Q, &X, &obs->l2, &obs->s2, &obs->j2);
00050   calcParity(Q, &X, &obs->pi);
00051   calcIsospin(Q, &X, &obs->t2);
00052 
00053   freeSlaterDetAux(&X);
00054 }

00057 void calcObservablesParity(const Interaction* Int, int parity,
00058                            const SlaterDet* Q,
00059                            Observables* obs)
00060 {
00061   Observablesod obsd, obsp;
00062 
00063   SlaterDet Qp;
00064   cloneSlaterDet(Q, &Qp);
00065   invertSlaterDet(&Qp);
00066 
00067   SlaterDetAux X;
00068   initSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00069   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, &X);
00070   calcObservablesod(Int, Q, Q, &X, &obsd); 
00071 
00072   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &Qp, &X);
00073   calcObservablesod(Int, Q, &Qp, &X, &obsp);
00074 
00075   double n = obsd.n + parity* obsp.n;
00076 
00077   obs->h = (obsd.h + parity* obsp.h)/n;
00078   obs->tcm = (obsd.tcm + parity* obsp.tcm)/n;
00079   obs->r2m = (obsd.r2m + parity* obsp.r2m)/n;
00080   obs->r2p = (obsd.r2p + parity* obsp.r2p)/n;
00081   obs->r2n = (obsd.r2n + parity* obsp.r2n)/n;
00082   obs->l2 = (obsd.l2 + parity* obsp.l2)/n;
00083   obs->s2 = (obsd.s2 + parity* obsp.s2)/n;
00084   obs->j2 = (obsd.j2 + parity* obsp.j2)/n;
00085   obs->pi = (obsd.pi + parity* obsp.pi)/n;
00086   obs->t2 = (obsd.t2 + parity* obsp.t2)/n;
00087   obs->t = (obsd.t + parity* obsp.t)/n;
00088  
00089   int i;
00090   for (i=0; i<Int->n; i++)
00091     obs->v[i] = (obsd.v[i] + parity* obsp.v[i])/n;
00092 
00093   freeSlaterDet(&Qp);
00094   freeSlaterDetAux(&X);
00095 }

00098 void fprintObservables(FILE *fp, 
00099                        const Interaction* Int, const SlaterDet* Q,
00100                        const Observables* obs)
00101 {
00102   fprintf(fp, "\nH = %9.3f MeV,   T = %9.3f MeV,   V = %9.3f MeV\n",
00103           hbc*obs->h, hbc*obs->t, hbc*obs->v[0]);
00104 
00105   fprintf(fp, "\n       Tcm =  %9.3f MeV\n\n", hbc*obs->tcm);
00106 
00107   int i;
00108   for (i=1; i<Int->n; i++)
00109     fprintf(fp, "%10s = %10.3f MeV\n", Int->label[i], hbc*obs->v[i]);
00110 
00111   fprintf(fp, "\nrm = %4.3f fm,   rp = %4.3f fm,   rn = %4.3f fm\n",
00112           sqrt(obs->r2m), sqrt(obs->r2p), sqrt(obs->r2n));
00113   fprintf(fp, "rcharge = %4.3f fm\n", sqrt(r2charge(obs->r2p, Q->N, Q->Z)));
00114 
00115   fprintf(fp, "\nL2 = %6.3f,   S2 = %6.3f,   J2 = %6.3f\n",
00116           obs->l2, obs->s2, obs->j2);
00117   fprintf(fp, "pi = %6.3f\n", obs->pi);
00118   fprintf(fp, "\nT2 = %6.3f\n", obs->t2);
00119 }

00123 void calcObservablesod(const Interaction* Int,
00124                        const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00125                        const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00126                        Observablesod* obs)
00127 {
00128   obs->n = X->ovlap;
00129 
00130   calcTod(Q, Qp, X, &obs->t);
00131   calcTCMod(Q, Qp, X, &obs->tcm);
00132   calcPotentialod(Int, Q, Qp, X, obs->v);
00133 
00134   if (Int->cm) obs->t -= obs->tcm;
00135   obs->h = obs->t + obs->v[0];
00136 
00137   calcRadii2od(Q, Qp, X, &obs->r2m, &obs->r2p, &obs->r2n);
00138   calcAngularMomentaod(Q, Qp, X, &obs->l2, &obs->s2, &obs->j2);
00139   calcParityod(Q, Qp, X, &obs->pi);
00140   calcIsospinod(Q, Qp, X, &obs->t2);
00141 }

00144 void scaleObservablesod(const Interaction* Int, Observablesod* obs)
00145 {
00146   int i;
00147   complex double sumV = 0.0;
00148 
00149   for (i=1; i<Int->n; i++) {
00150     obs->v[i] *= Int->scale[i];
00151     sumV += obs->v[i];
00152   }
00153   obs->v[0] = sumV;
00154   obs->h = obs->t + obs->v[0];
00155 }
